ISSUE.TITLE: robots.txt cart disallow
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 3.9+ Steps to reproduce the problem: Have a product that starts with "cart". If you are selling "cartier" watches, you will be in trouble. Manufacturer "cartier" and products starting with "cart" will NOT get indexed in google. Suggestion: Google supports end of line: "$". So change it to Disallow: /cart$ Issue is explained here: https://developers.google.com/search/reference/robots_txt
